name: Cupid's Challenge
description:
You are Cupid, playing matchmaker by shooting arrows.

Make matches by hitting two of the same. 

When hit, the character will speed up. Make a match before it leaves the screen or you will need to start over.

If you hit the same one twice, the unrequited character fades into a wallflower your score goes down.

You have a limited amount of arrows per round.

Matchmaking quotas and arrows will increase each level.

If you run out of arrows, the game ends.
